data: `minecraft:ticking` is a component controlled by a `JSON object` that describes how the component will trigger an event at a regular interval between two values.
`minecraft:ticking` can use the following parameters that are fired on-tick.

data.Name: condition
data.Description: The condition of event to be executed on the block.

data.Name: event
data.Description: The type of event executed on the block.

data.Name: range
data.Description: The Range between which the component will trigger his event.

data.Name: target
data.Description: The target of event executed on the block.
